meanings.definition: The act or practice of engaging in a race.
meanings.sent1: The racings at the school track were exciting to watch.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys participating in horse racings on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The racings between the tortoise and the hare always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: In the racings of life, sometimes it's not about speed but endurance.
meanings.sent5: The racings of the cars around the circuit left a lasting impression on the spectators.

meanings.definition: The sport of engaging in races.
meanings.sent1: Watching the racings on TV is a popular pastime for many.
meanings.sent2: He trains hard to compete in professional car racings.
meanings.sent3: The racings event brought together athletes from all over the world.
meanings.sent4: In the racings world, every second counts.
meanings.sent5: The racings competition was fierce, with each participant giving their all.

meanings.definition: The act of moving swiftly or hurriedly.
meanings.sent1: The racings of the cheetah are a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: She hurried through the racings of the busy city streets.
meanings.sent3: His racings to catch the bus always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down amidst the racings of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The racings of the wind through the trees created a soothing melody.
